verses.content: Chun, hieng hi Esau thlahai chu an nih (Esau chu Edom a nih).
Esau chun a nuhmeihai chu Kanaan nunghâk laia mi a nih a nei chu: Hit mi Elon naunu Ada le, Hiv mi Zibeon tunu Ana naunu Oholibama le,
Ismael naunu, Nebaioth farnu Basemath an nih.
Ada chun Esau chu Eliphaz a neipêk a; Basemath chun Reuel a nei a,
Oholibama chun Jeus, Jalam le Kora a nei a; chuong chu Esau naupasal Kanaan rama pienghai chu an nih.

Chun, Esau chun a nuhmeihai, a naupasalhai, a naunuhmeihai le, a ina mi po po, a ranhai, a sa po po le, Kanaan rama a lam suok a thilnei po po chu a sawm a, a sang kuoma inthawk chu ram dangah a fe ta dai a.
An thil neihai chu a nasa taluoh a, an um hmunkhat thei naw a nih; an ranhai leiin an khuolchâmna ram chun a dai ta si nawh a.
Chuongchun, Esau chu Seir tlânga chun a um tah a; Esau chu Edom a nih.
Hieng hi Seir tlânga Edom mihai thlatu Esau thlahai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Esau naupasalhai hming chu an nih: Esau nuhmei Ada naupa Eliphaz, Esau nuhmei Basemath naupa Reuel.
Eliphaz naupasalhai chu Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam le Kenaz an nih.
(Timna chu Esau naupa Eliphaz thaikêm a nih, ama chun Eliphaz chu Amalek a neipêk a). Hieng hi Esau nuhmei Ada naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Reuel naupasalhai chu an nih: Nahath, Zera, Samma le Mizza hi. Hieng hi Esau nuhmei Basemath naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Zibeon tunu Ana naunu Oholibama, Esau nuhmei, naupasalhai an nih: ama chun Esau chu Jeus, Jalam le Kora a neipêk a.
Hieng hi Esau naupasalhai laia hotuhai chu an nih: Esau nau lutîr Eliphaz naupasalhaia hotuhai: Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz,
Kora, Gatam le Amalek hi: hieng hi Edom rama Eliphaz-a inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih; chuong chu Ada naupasalhai chu an nih.

Hieng hi Esau naupa Reuel naupasalhai chu an nih: hotu Nahath, Zera, Samma le Mizza hi: hieng hi Edom rama Reuela inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih, hieng hi Esau nuhmei Basemath naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Esau nuhmei Oholi- bama naupasalhai chu an nih: hotu Jeus, Jalam le Kora hi; hieng hi Ana naunu, Esau nuhmei Oholibama naupasalhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi Esau naupasalhai chu an nih; hieng hi anni laia hotuhai chu an nih: Esau chu Edom a nih.
Hieng hi Hor mi, Seir nau- pasalhai chu rama umhai chu an nih: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana,
Dison, Ezer le Disan hi. Hieng hi Edom rama Seir naupasalhai, Hor mihaia inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih.
Lotan nauhai chu Hori le Hemam an nih, chun, Lotan farnu chu Timna a nih.
Hieng hi Sobal nauhai chu an nih: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Sepho le Onam hi.
Hieng hi Zibeon nauhai chu an nih: Aia le Ana hi. Hi Ana hi a nih a pa Zibeon sabengtung lien chihai an thla laia thlalêra tuilumkhurhai hmu suoktu kha.
Hieng hi Ana nauhai chu an nih: Dison le Ana naunu Oholibama hi.
Hieng hi Dison nauhai chu an nih: Hemdan, Esban, Ithran le Cheran hi.
Hieng hi Ezer nauhai chu an nih: Bilhan, Zaavan le Akan hi.
Hieng hi Disan nauhai chu an nih: Uz le Aran hi.
Hieng hi Hor mihaia inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih: hotu Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana,
Dison, Ezer le Disan hi: hieng hi Seir rama an chihai ang peia Hor mihaia inthawka suok hotuhai chu an nih.
Hieng hi lal hrim hrimin Israel thlahai chunga ro an rêl hmaa Edom rama rorêltu lalhai chu an nih.
Beor naupa Bela chun Edomah ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a nih.
Bela chu a thih a, Bozra mi Zera naupa Jobab chun a ai awin ro a rêl a.
Jobab chu a thih a, Teman mihai rama mi Husam chun a ai awin ro a rêl a.
Husam chu a thih a, Bedad naupa Hadad, Moab phûla Midian mihai thattu khan a ai awin ro a rêl a, a khawpui hming chu Avith a nih.
Hadad chu a thih a, Masreka mi Samla chun a ai awin ro a rêl a.
Samla chu a thih a, Vadungpui kama Rehoboth mi Saula chun a ai awin ro a rêl a.
Saula chu a thih a, Akbor naupa Baal-hanan chun a ai awin ro a rêl a.
Akbor naupa Baal-hanan chu a thih a, Hadar chun a ai awin ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Pau a nih; a nuhmei hming chu Mezahab naunu Matred naunu Mehetabel a nih.
Chun, hieng hi an sûngkuo ang pei, an hmun ang pei le an hming ang peia Esau thla hotuhai hming chu a nih: Hotuhai Timna, Alva, Jetheth,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram hi: Hieng hi an ram neia an umna ang peia Edom (chu chu Edom mihai thlatu Esau) thla hotuhai chu an nih.
